Accuracy.description: Correctness of the answers provided by the agent.

Completeness.description: Completion of all required steps to answer the question.

Efficiency.description: Resource usage efficiency, including time and computational resources.

Robustness.description: System's adaptability to different types of questions and unexpected situations.

Traceability.description: Clarity of the reasoning trace for validation or learning purposes.

Compliance with Constraints.description: Adherence to movement rules and avoidance of data contamination.

Scalability.description: System's ability to maintain performance with increasing workload.

User Satisfaction.description: Users' subjective assessment based on ease of use and answer satisfaction.
